summary.span: 发现属性 (Property) 的属性 (Attribute) 并提供对属性 (Property) 元数据的访问。

span.span: Discovers the attributes of a property and provides access to property metadata.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性在逻辑上与字段相同。Properties are logically the same as fields. 属性是其值是通常可通过访问的对象的状态的已命名的一个方面`get`和`set`访问器。A property is a named aspect of an object's state whose value is typically accessible through `get` and `set` accessors. 属性可能是只读的在这种情况下不支持 set 例程。Properties may be read-only, in which case a set routine is not supported. > [!NOTE] > 若要确定属性是否是`static`，你必须获取为`get`或`set`访问器，通过调用或方法，并检查其属性。To determine whether a property is `static`, you must obtain the for the `get` or `set` accessor, by calling the or the method, and examine its property. 此类中的多个方法假定`get`访问器和`set`的属性访问器方法具有某些格式。Several methods in this class assume that the `get` accessor and `set` accessor methods of a property have certain formats. 签名`get`和`set`方法必须符合以下约定：The signatures of the `get` and `set` methods must match the following convention: - 返回类型`get`方法和的最后一个参数`set`方法必须相同。The return type of the `get` method and the last argument of the `set` method must be identical. 这是属性的类型。This is the type of the property. - `get`和`set`方法必须具有相同的数量、 类型和顺序的索引。The `get` and `set` methods must have the same number, type, and order of indices. 如果不遵循此格式的行为`GetValue`和`SetValue`方法是不确定。If this format is not followed, the behavior of the `GetValue` and `SetValue` methods is undefined. 调用上`PropertyInfo`时`inherit`参数`GetCustomAttributes`是`true`不会遍历的类型层次结构。Calling on `PropertyInfo` when the `inherit` parameter of `GetCustomAttributes` is `true` does not walk the type hierarchy. 使用继承自定义属性。Use to inherit custom attributes. ## Examples 此示例演示如何使用各种反射类来分析程序集中包含的元数据。This example shows how to use various reflection classes to analyze the metadata contained in an assembly. > [!NOTE] > 此示例生成大约 55000 行数据，你可以将重定向到在命令提示符下，一个文本文件，如下所示： **example.exe > 处将这些数据**This example generates about 55,000 lines of data, which you can redirect to a text file at the command prompt, as follows: **example.exe > propertyinfo.txt** [!code-cpp[Reflection#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Reflection/CPP/reflection.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Reflection#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Reflection/CS/Reflection.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Reflection#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Reflection/VB/Reflection.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取此属性 (Property) 的属性 (Attribute)。

span.span: Gets the attributes for this property.
The attributes of this property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性返回表示此属性与关联的属性对象。The property returns the attributes associated with the property represented by this object. 属性是主要时创建的属性; 应用由编译器的修饰符它们指示属性是否是默认属性，`SpecialName`属性，依次类推。The attributes are primarily modifiers applied by a compiler when creating a property; they indicate whether a property is the default property, a `SpecialName` property, and so on. 请注意，在.NET Framework 类库的值中的类型中找到的几乎所有属性属性是。Note that, for almost all properties found in types in the .NET Framework class library, the value of the property is . > [!TIP] > 在大多数情况下，你可能想要检索与属性相关联的自定义属性。In most cases, you probably want to retrieve the custom attributes associated with a property. 若要执行此操作，检索的值属性或调用的重载之一方法。To do this, retrieve the value of the property, or call one of the overloads of the method. 若要获取属性：To get the property: 1. 获取表示属性所属的类型的对象。Get a object that represents the type to which the property belongs. 2. 获取对象通过调用的重载方法。Get the object by calling an overload of the method. 3. 检索属性的属性从属性。Retrieve the property's attributes from the property. 你可以定义一个用于创建使用动态反射的类型的属性的属性来发出调用的重载方法并提供的值`attributes`自变量。You can define the attributes of a property for a type created dynamically using reflection emit by calling an overload of the method and supplying a value for the `attributes` argument.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法是为设计器提供的托管的编译器和代码分析。This method is provided for designers of managed compilers and code analyzers. > [!NOTE] > 不要在仅限反射上下文中，使用此方法，因为它可能会导致代码执行。Do not use this method in the reflection-only context, because it might cause code to execute. 请改用 方法。Use the method instead. 在非托管元数据中的常数表用于存储的字段、 参数和属性的常数值。In unmanaged metadata, the Constant table is used to store constant values for fields, parameters, and properties. 常量的信息不会直接影响运行时行为。Constant information does not directly influence runtime behavior. 编译器检查此信息，请在编译时，导入元数据时。Compilers inspect this information, at compile time, when importing metadata. 如果使用，则编译器将发出 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 流中嵌入常量的值。If used, the value of a constant is embedded in the Microsoft intermediate language (MSIL) stream the compiler emits. 有可用来在运行时访问的常数表没有 MSIL 指令。There are no MSIL instructions that can be used to access the Constant table at run time. > [!NOTE] > 常量值和常量的表的详细信息，请参阅 ECMA 第 ii 部分文档。For more information on constant values and the Constant table, see the ECMA Partition II documentation. 可联机获取该文档；请参阅 MSDN 上的 [ECMA C# 和公共语言基础结构标准](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=99212)和 Ecma International 网站上的[标准 ECMA-335 - 公共语言基础结构 (CLI)](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65552)。The documentation is available online; see [ECMA C# and Common Language Infrastructure Standards](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=99212) on MSDN and [Standard ECMA-335 - Common Language Infrastructure (CLI)](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65552) on the Ecma International Web site.

exception.span: 非托管元数据中的常数表不包含当前属性的常数值。

span.span: The Constant table in unmanaged metadata does not contain a constant value for the current property.

exception.span: 值的类型不是公共语言规范 (CLS) 许可的类型。

span.span: The type of the value is not one of the types permitted by the Common Language Specification (CLS).

exception.span: 请参阅“ECMA Partition II”（ECMA 第二部分）规范中的“Metadata”（元数据）。

span.span: See the ECMA Partition II specification, Metadata.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法是为设计器提供的托管的编译器和代码分析。This method is provided for designers of managed compilers and code analyzers. 执行上下文和仅限反射上下文中，可以使用此方法。This method can be used in both the execution context and the reflection-only context. 在非托管元数据中的常数表用于存储的字段、 参数和属性的常数值。In unmanaged metadata, the Constant table is used to store constant values for fields, parameters, and properties. 常量的信息不会直接影响运行时行为。Constant information does not directly influence runtime behavior. 编译器检查此信息，请在编译时，导入元数据时。Compilers inspect this information, at compile time, when importing metadata. 如果使用，则编译器将发出 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 流中嵌入常量的值。If used, the value of a constant is embedded in the Microsoft intermediate language (MSIL) stream the compiler emits. 有可用来在运行时访问的常数表没有 MSIL 指令。There are no MSIL instructions that can be used to access the Constant table at run time. > [!NOTE] > 常量值和常量的表的详细信息，请参阅 ECMA 第 ii 部分文档。For more information on constant values and the Constant table, see the ECMA Partition II documentation. 可联机获取该文档；请参阅 MSDN 上的 [ECMA C# 和公共语言基础结构标准](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=99212)和 Ecma International 网站上的[标准 ECMA-335 - 公共语言基础结构 (CLI)](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65552)。The documentation is available online; see [ECMA C# and Common Language Infrastructure Standards](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=99212) on MSDN and [Standard ECMA-335 - Common Language Infrastructure (CLI)](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65552) on the Ecma International Web site.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你调用重载来检索非索引化属性的值; 如果你尝试检索索引属性的值，该方法将引发异常。You call the overload to retrieve the value of a non-indexed property; if you try to retrieve the value of an indexed property, the method throws a exception. 你可以确定是否属性编制了索引或不是通过调用方法。You can determine whether a property is indexed or not by calling the method. 如果返回的长度数组为零，、 未被索引的属性。If the length of the returned array is zero, the property is not indexed. 这是提供实现的抽象的便捷方法方法替换参数设置为、设置为`null`，对象数组的索引值设置为`null`，与设置为`null`。This is a convenience method that provides an implementation for the abstract method with the parameter set to , the set to `null`, the object array of index values set to `null`, and the set to `null`. ## Examples 下面的示例定义`Planet`具有两个属性的类： `Name`，在世界各地; 的名称和`Distance`，从地球在世界各地的距离。The following example defines a `Planet` class that has two properties: `Name`, the name of the planet; and `Distance`, the planet's distance from Earth. 该示例实例化`Planet`对象，表示在世界各地 Jupiter 并将其传递给`GetPropertyValues`显示信息的属性和使用的方法方法以获取每个值`Planet`属性。The example instantiates a `Planet` object that represents the planet Jupiter and passes it to a `GetPropertyValues` method that displays information about the properties and uses the method to get the value of each `Planet` property. remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要确定是否属性编制了索引，请使用方法。To determine whether a property is indexed, use the method. 如果生成的数组具有 0 （零） 个元素，该属性未被索引。If the resulting array has 0 (zero) elements, the property is not indexed. 这是提供实现的抽象的便捷方法`GetValue`方法替换`BindingFlags`参数`Default`、`Binder`设置为`null`，和`CultureInfo`设置为`null`。This is a convenience method that provides an implementation for the abstract `GetValue` method with a `BindingFlags` parameter of `Default`, the `Binder` set to `null`, and the `CultureInfo` set to `null`. 因为静态属性属于类型，而不是单个对象，通过传递获取静态属性`null`作为对象自变量。Because static properties belong to the type, not individual objects, get static properties by passing `null` as the object argument. 例如，使用以下代码获取静态`CurrentCulture`属性`CultureInfo`:For example, use the following code to get the static `CurrentCulture` property of `CultureInfo` : ```csharp PropertyInfo CurCultProp = (typeof(CultureInfo)).GetProperty("CurrentCulture"); Console.WriteLine("CurrCult: " + CurCultProp.GetValue(null,null)); ``` 若要使用`GetValue`方法，首先需要获取类`Type`。To use the `GetValue` method, first get the class `Type`. 从`Type`，获取`PropertyInfo`。From the `Type`, get the `PropertyInfo`. 从`PropertyInfo`，使用`GetValue`方法。From the `PropertyInfo`, use the `GetValue` method. > [!NOTE] > 从开始[!INCLUDE[net_v20sp1_long](~/includes/net-v20sp1-long-md.md)]，此方法可以用于访问非公共成员，如果调用方已被授予与标志，并且如果非公共成员的授予集限制为调用方的授予集或子集其中。Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v20sp1_long](~/includes/net-v20sp1-long-md.md)], this method can be used to access non-public members if the caller has been granted with the flag and if the grant set of the non-public members is restricted to the caller’s grant set, or a subset thereof. (请参阅[反射的安全注意事项](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/security-considerations-for-reflection.md)。)(See [Security Considerations for Reflection](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/security-considerations-for-reflection.md).) > > 若要使用此功能，应用程序应为 [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)] 或更高版本。To use this functionality, your application should target the [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)] or later. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何获取一个索引属性的值。The following example shows how to get the value of an indexed property. 属性为默认属性 （C# 中的索引器）类。The property is the default property (the indexer in C#) of the class. remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要确定是否属性编制了索引，请使用方法。To determine whether a property is indexed, use the method. 如果生成的数组具有 0 （零） 个元素，该属性未被索引。If the resulting array has 0 (zero) elements, the property is not indexed. 因为静态属性属于类型，而不是单个对象，通过传递获取静态属性`null`作为对象自变量。Because static properties belong to the type, not individual objects, get static properties by passing `null` as the object argument. 例如，使用以下代码获取静态`CurrentCulture`属性`CultureInfo`:For example, use the following code to get the static `CurrentCulture` property of `CultureInfo` : ```csharp PropertyInfo CurCultProp = (typeof(CultureInfo)).GetProperty("CurrentCulture"); Console.WriteLine("CurrCult: " + CurCultProp.GetValue(null,null)); ``` 若要使用`GetValue`方法，首先需要获取类`Type`。To use the `GetValue` method, first get the class `Type`. 从`Type`，获取`PropertyInfo`。From the `Type`, get the `PropertyInfo`. 从`PropertyInfo`，使用`GetValue`方法。From the `PropertyInfo`, use the `GetValue` method. > [!NOTE] > 从开始[!INCLUDE[net_v20sp1_long](~/includes/net-v20sp1-long-md.md)]，此方法可以用于访问非公共成员，如果调用方已被授予与标志，并且如果非公共成员的授予集限制为调用方的授予集或子集其中。Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v20sp1_long](~/includes/net-v20sp1-long-md.md)], this method can be used to access non-public members if the caller has been granted with the flag and if the grant set of the non-public members is restricted to the caller’s grant set, or a subset thereof. remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要确定特定属性的类型，请执行以下操作：To determine the type of a particular property, do the following: 1. 获取表示包含属性的类型 （类或结构） 的对象。Get a object that represents the type (the class or structure) that contains the property. 如果你正在使用的对象 （一种类型的实例），则可以调用其方法。If you are working with an object (an instance of a type), you can call its method. 否则为你可以使用 C# 运算符或 Visual Basic 运算符，与示例图示。Otherwise, you can use the C# operator or the Visual Basic operator, as the example illustrates. 2. 获取表示你感兴趣的属性的对象。Get a object that represents the property in which you're interested. 你可以执行此操作通过获取数组中的所有属性方法，然后循环中的数组，或者，你的元素可以检索直接通过调用表示的属性的对象方法并指定属性名称。You can do this by getting an array of all properties from the method and then iterating the elements in the array, or you can retrieve the object that represents the property directly by calling the method and specifying the property name. 3. 检索的值属性从对象。Retrieve the value of the property from the object. ## Examples 下面的示例定义`Employee`具有五个属性的类。The following example defines an `Employee` class that has five properties. 它然后使用检索的数组表示这些属性并显示名称和每个类型的对象。It then uses retrieves an array of objects that represent those properties and displays the name and type of each. [!code-csharp[System.Reflection.PropertyInfo.PropertyType#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.reflection.propertyinfo.propertytype/cs/propertytype1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Reflection.PropertyInfo.PropertyType#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.reflection.propertyinfo.propertytype/vb/propertytype1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 重载设置非索引化属性的值。The overload sets the value of a non-indexed property. 若要确定是否属性编制了索引，请调用方法。To determine whether a property is indexed, call the method. 如果生成的数组具有 0 （零） 个元素，该属性未被索引。If the resulting array has 0 (zero) elements, the property is not indexed. 若要设置索引的属性的值，调用重载。To set the value of an indexed property, call the overload. 如果此属性键入对象是值类型和`value`是`null`，属性将设置为该类型的默认值。If the property type of this object is a value type and `value` is `null`, the property will be set to the default value for that type. 这是调用运行时实现的抽象的便捷方法方法，指定为`BindingFlags`参数，`null`为`Binder`，`null`为`Object[]`，和`null`为`CultureInfo`。This is a convenience method that calls the runtime implementation of the abstract method, specifying for the `BindingFlags` parameter, `null` for `Binder`, `null` for `Object[]`, and `null` for `CultureInfo`. 若要使用方法，请首先获取表示的类的对象。To use the method, first get a object that represents the class. 从，获取对象。From the , get the object. 从对象，请调用方法。From the object, call the method. > [!NOTE] > 从开始[!INCLUDE[net_v20sp1_long](~/includes/net-v20sp1-long-md.md)]，此方法可以用于访问非公共成员，如果调用方已被授予与标志，并且如果非公共成员的授予集限制为调用方的授予集或子集其中。Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v20sp1_long](~/includes/net-v20sp1-long-md.md)], this method can be used to access non-public members if the caller has been granted with the flag and if the grant set of the non-public members is restricted to the caller’s grant set, or a subset thereof. (请参阅[反射的安全注意事项](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/security-considerations-for-reflection.md)。)(See [Security Considerations for Reflection](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/security-considerations-for-reflection.md).) > > 若要使用此功能，应用程序应为 [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)] 或更高版本。To use this functionality, your application should target the [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)] or later. ## Examples 下面的示例声明一个名为类`Example`具有一个`static`(`Shared`在 Visual Basic 中) 和一个实例属性。The following example declares a class named `Example` with one `static` (`Shared` in Visual Basic) and one instance property. 该示例使用方法可以更改原始属性值并显示原始和最后一个值。The example uses the method to change the original property values and displays the original and final values. (请参阅[反射的安全注意事项](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/security-considerations-for-reflection.md)。)(See [Security Considerations for Reflection](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/security-considerations-for-reflection.md).) > > 若要使用此功能，应用程序应为 [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)] 或更高版本。To use this functionality, your application should target the [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)] or later. ## Examples 下面的示例定义一个名为`TestClass`具有名为的读写属性`Caption`。The following example defines a class named `TestClass` that has a read-write property named `Caption`. 它显示的默认值`Caption`属性、 调用方法可以更改属性值，并显示结果。It displays the default value of the `Caption` property, calls the method to change the property value, and displays the result. [!code-cpp[Classic PropertyInfo.SetValue1 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic PropertyInfo.SetValue1 Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic PropertyInfo.SetValue1 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic PropertyInfo.SetValue1 Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic PropertyInfo.SetValue1 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic PropertyInfo.SetValue1 Example/VB/source.vb#1)] 请注意，因为`Caption`属性不是参数数组，`index`自变量是`null`。Note that, because the `Caption` property is not a parameter array, the `index` argument is `null`. 下面的示例声明一个名为类`Example`具有三个属性：`static`属性 (`Shared`在 Visual Basic 中)，一个实例属性和一个索引的实例属性。The following example declares a class named `Example` with three properties: a `static` property (`Shared` in Visual Basic), an instance property, and an indexed instance property. 该示例使用方法可以更改的属性和显示原始和最终值的默认值。The example uses the method to change the default values of the properties and displays the original and final values. 用于搜索的反射的索引的实例属性的名称是不同，具体取决于语言和应用到该属性的属性。The name that is used to search for an indexed instance property with reflection is different depending on the language and on attributes applied to the property. - 在 Visual Basic 中，属性名称始终用于搜索具有反射的属性。In Visual Basic, the property name is always used to search for the property with reflection. 你可以使用`Default`关键字来将该属性的默认索引属性，在这种情况下则可以省略名称时访问的属性，如此示例所示。You can use the `Default` keyword to make the property a default indexed property, in which case you can omit the name when accessing the property, as in this example. 你还可以使用属性名称。You can also use the property name. - 在 C# 中，索引的 instance 属性是名为一个索引器的默认属性和访问代码中的属性时，永远不会使用的名称。In C#, the indexed instance property is a default property called an indexer, and the name is never used when accessing the property in code. 默认情况下，该属性的名称是`Item`，并且具有反射的属性搜索时，你必须使用该名称。By default, the name of the property is `Item`, and you must use that name when you search for the property with reflection. 你可以使用属性以指定不同名称的索引器。You can use the attribute to give the indexer a different name. 在本示例中，该名称为 `IndexedInstanceProperty`。In this example, the name is `IndexedInstanceProperty`. - C + + 中`default`说明符可以用于将索引的属性的默认索引属性 （类索引器）。In C++, the `default` specifier can be used to make an indexed property a default indexed property (class indexer). 在这种情况下，默认情况下属性的名称是`Item`，并且具有反射，如此示例所示的属性搜索时，你必须使用该名称。In that case, the name of the property by default is `Item`, and you must use that name when you search for the property with reflection, as in this example. 你可以使用属性为类索引器，请指定不同的名称在反射中，但不能使用该名称来访问代码中的属性。You can use the attribute to give the class indexer a different name in reflection, but you cannot use that name to access the property in code. 使用其名称，在代码和反射来访问索引的属性不是类索引器。An indexed property that is not a class indexer is accessed using its name, both in code and in reflection. [!code-cpp[PropertyInfo.SetValue#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/PropertyInfo.SetValue/cpp/Example.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[PropertyInfo.SetValue#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/PropertyInfo.SetValue/cs/Example.cs#1)] [!code-vb[PropertyInfo.SetValue#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/PropertyInfo.SetValue/vb/Example.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果此对象是值类型和`value`是`null`，则该属性将设置为该类型的默认值。If this object is a value type and `value` is `null`, then the property will be set to the default value for that type. 若要确定是否属性编制了索引，请使用方法。To determine whether a property is indexed, use the method. 如果生成的数组具有 0 （零） 个元素，该属性未被索引。If the resulting array has 0 (zero) elements, the property is not indexed. 访问限制会忽略完全受信任的代码。Access restrictions are ignored for fully trusted code. 也就是说，是在私有构造函数、 方法、 字段和属性访问而完全受信任代码时，通过反射调用。That is, private constructors, methods, fields, and properties can be accessed and invoked via Reflection whenever the code is fully trusted. 若要使用`SetValue`方法，首先需要获取类`Type`。To use the `SetValue` method, first get the class `Type`. 从`Type`，获取`PropertyInfo`。From the `Type`, get the `PropertyInfo`. 从`PropertyInfo`，使用`SetValue`方法。From the `PropertyInfo`, use the `SetValue` method. > [!NOTE] > 从开始[!INCLUDE[net_v20sp1_long](~/includes/net-v20sp1-long-md.md)]，此方法可以用于访问非公共成员，如果调用方已被授予与标志，并且如果非公共成员的授予集限制为调用方的授予集或子集其中。Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v20sp1_long](~/includes/net-v20sp1-long-md.md)], this method can be used to access non-public members if the caller has been granted with the flag and if the grant set of the non-public members is restricted to the caller’s grant set, or a subset thereof. (请参阅[反射的安全注意事项](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/security-considerations-for-reflection.md)。)(See [Security Considerations for Reflection](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/security-considerations-for-reflection.md).) > > 若要使用此功能，应用程序应为 [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)] 或更高版本。To use this functionality, your application should target the [!INCLUDE[net_v35_long](~/includes/net-v35-long-md.md)] or later.
